results.title: Signs of understanding
results.brief_description: Kris Chapman talks about the ACMI/Vicdeaf Project, its purpose and of the six deaf/hearing impaired people chosen to take part and contribute their stories and thoughts. With Auslan signing and subtitles.

results.title: I live again
results.brief_description: A moving story of how one man’s life was completely turned inside out when he suffered a stroke resulting in a loss of hearing. With subtitles.

results.title: My journey to strength
results.brief_description: Hilda suffers from deafness and here she gives a frank account of the ups and downs in her life and the traumatic effect of losing her mum just before she turned 18. Through support and determination she has survived years of depression and finally found happiness and acceptance. With subtitles.
results.description: Hilda suffers from deafness and here she gives a frank account of the ups and downs in her life and the traumatic effect of losing her mum just before she turned 18. results.title: When deaf minds travel
results.brief_description: Much is written and discussed about the mental health challenges for the deaf community, but rarely do we hear from those directly dealing with these challenges. This project was produced in partnership with VicDeaf.

results.title: Pandamonium
results.creator_credit: Daniel Riddle and Academy of Interactive Entertainment (AIE)
results.brief_description: A bad tempered stuffed panda is plucked from the window display of a toy store by a sweet little girl. 3-D computer animation. Original score composed by Chris Lam Sam.

results.title: The Lunar cycle
results.creator_credit: Kai Faigenbaum and Academy of Interactive Entertainment (AIE)
results.brief_description:
A man on a unicycle travels above the sleeping city on a cloudy night, sweeping darkness away to reveal a new moon. This 3D animated fable offers a new interpretation of the term ‘lunar cycle’.
Music by Andy Statman.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kai Faigenbaum and Academy of Interactive Entertainment (AIE)

results.title: Vicki's story
results.creator_credit: Vicki Atkinson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Vicki reminisces about her family and childhood and how she looked up to her parents as role models hoping that what she has learned from them can be passed on to her own two daughters. This is her message.
results.description: Vicki reminisces about her family and childhood and how she looked up to her parents as role models hoping that what she has learned from them can be passed on to her own two daughters. This is her message.
